name: Felix Barrett
introduction: Felix Barrett MBE is the founder and Artistic Director of Punchdrunk and Punchdrunk International, theatre companies recognised as pioneers of game-changing ways for audiences to experience culture.He is the creator and executive producer of The Third Day (2020), the first original drama produced by Sky's new production house, Sky Studios, in partnership with Plan B Entertainment, Punchdrunk International and writer Dennis Kelly. It is the latest commission from Sky and HBO as part of their collaboration on original projects and is due to air in the UK and USA in 2020.
